title: Red Dawn
description: Rule number one, when living with aliens, never make assumptions.Rule number two, knowledge is power.Rule number three, don't fall in love.Assigned as an interpreter to the Cyngi, Liaison Sadie Beckit is left in the dark. The mysterious speciesâ€™ data chip, from head quarters, holds minimal information and Ambassador Nual refuses to give her more. As the Red Dawn is held under siege in a remote part of space, the crew and passengers fight for their lives. Sadie's orders are to escape but her heart is already a hostage.Falling in love was not in her orders and broke rules one through three.
author: Annie Nicholas
